theme: Bar staff upsell + local promos on slow nights

avatar_style.persona: A relatable, slightly tired but resourceful bar staff member (30s, approachable).
avatar_style.wardrobe: Casual, practical bar attire: dark t-shirt, simple apron, comfortable pants.
avatar_style.setting: A cozy, slightly quiet neighborhood bar during off-peak hours (early evening).

script.speaker: host
script.line: Ever have those slow bar nights? You've got screens, but what's on them? Usually just sports or an empty placeholder. Wasted potential, right?
script.broll_cue: Bar staff looking thoughtfully at a quiet bar and a dark TV screen.

script.speaker: host
script.line: I used to just put up a chalk sign for tonight's special. But trying to update a dozen items, or local happenings, felt like another job.
script.broll_cue: Bar staff gesturing towards a small, hand-written chalk sign, then looking overwhelmed with a stack of old flyers.

script.speaker: host
script.line: Then I found Trillboards. Software-only. Super easy. Just scan a QR code from my phone, and boom – TV’s ready.
script.broll_cue: Bar staff pulling out a smartphone, approaching the TV which displays a QR code, and scanning it with a relieved expression.
script.on_screen_text: Meet Trillboards: TV control from your phone.

script.speaker: host
script.line: Now I can program rotating cards: our cocktail specials, happy hour times, even upcoming events. All from my phone, live.
script.broll_cue: TV screen now shows dynamic, well-designed rotating cards. Staff member is smiling, holding phone showing Trillboards app.

script.speaker: host
script.line: And the cool part? We can add local promos. With the owner’s OK, a local barber shop or yoga studio can pay a small fee to appear. We've seen an extra $10-$40 a day on good nights, depending on traffic.
script.broll_cue: TV shows a local promo card (e.g., 'Local Barber Shop Offer'). Staff member subtly holds up a few dollar bills, indicating earnings.

script.speaker: host
script.line: It's a win-win. We promote our stuff, help local businesses, and earn a little extra. All without babysitting a screen. Just make sure you've got venue permission first!
script.broll_cue: Staff member looks confidently at the camera, TV in background continues rotating content. They give a subtle thumbs-up.

caption_overlay.text: Ever have those slow bar nights? You've got screens, but what's on them? Usually just sports or an empty placeholder. Wasted potential, right?
I used to just put up a chalk sign for tonight's special. But trying to update a dozen items, or local happenings, felt like another job.
Then I found Trillboards. Software-only. Super easy. Just scan a QR code from my phone, and boom – TV’s ready.
Now I can program rotating cards: our cocktail specials, happy hour times, even upcoming events. All from my phone, live.

And the cool part? We can add local promos. With the owner’s OK, a local barber shop or yoga studio can pay a small fee to appear. We've seen an extra $10-$40 a day on good nights, depending on traffic.
It's a win-win. We promote our stuff, help local businesses, and earn a little extra. All without babysitting a screen. Just make sure you've got venue permission first!

primary: Large TV screen (initially off/static, then displaying Trillboards content)
secondary: Local promo examples (e.g., barber shop, yoga studio)

trillboards_touchpoints.action: Pairing TV via phone app and QR code on screen.trillboards.com
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Solves hardware setup; makes any TV a digital sign.

trillboards_touchpoints.action: Using Trillboards app to schedule and update house specials, events, etc.
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Automates content rotation, keeps info fresh, reduces manual effort.

trillboards_touchpoints.action: Integrating paid local promos from the marketplace into the playlist.
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Generates additional income for the venue (EARNER) and provides value to local businesses (ADVERTISERS).

trillboards_touchpoints.action: Quickly changing or adding content from the app.
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Provides flexibility and real-time control over screen content.

constraints_and_risks: Always get venue owner/management permission before using Trillboards for local promos or monetizing screens.
Avoid promos that directly compete with the host venue's offerings (e.g., don't promote another bar's happy hour).
Earnings are variable and depend on foot traffic, location, and fill rate; avoid over-promising specific amounts.

metrics_hypothesis.shareability_notes: Targets bar/restaurant staff, small business owners, venue managers looking for easy extra income and promotion tools. Relatable problem-solution narrative.

alt_hooks: Is your bar's TV just... there? You're missing out!
Stuck promoting specials with chalkboards? There's a better way.

rights_and_clearance_notes: Standard clearance for talent, music, and any brand logos (Trillboards logo only). Stock footage for bar interior and phone screen overlays if needed. Talent release for host.
